Name: Yukkina
Notes: A snow boss that attacks the player by rolling into them. Its red nose can only be hit using Spin Attacks. After hitting it three times, it will be defeated which makes a Power Star appear. However, this requires a properly configured Scenario entry.

Obj_arg7.Name: Camera Register Index
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies the starting index of the vector register camera.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

LinkNamePos.Description: Additional placements that need to be linked to the object.

Values.Notes: Player's position during the intro and ending cutscenes

Camera.Description: オープニングデモスキップ is used when skipping the intro cutscene.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
